    • setAssistantCardsImageView

      private void setAssistantCardsImageView()
      Adds the Imageview of the assistant card in the array "assistantCards".

    • setAssistantCardsImages

      private void setAssistantCardsImages()
      Sets the images of the assistant card in the relative ImageView. The front of the card is displayed if the card is available in the deck, the back of the card if it's already been used. Sends a message to the server asking for the player status that contains the list of assistant cards played.

    • setRetro

      private void setRetro(javafx.scene.image.ImageView cardView, int idDeck)
      Sets the ImageView the back of the card.
      Parameters:
      cardView - ImageView to set
      idDeck - id of the deck chosen by the player. Every deck has a different back for the cards

    • setUpLabelArray

      private void setUpLabelArray()

    • playAssistantCard

      private void playAssistantCard(int i, javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Sends a message to the server with the command playAssistantCard and the index of the assistant card chosen.
      Parameters:
      i - index of the assistant card played.
      actionEvent - ActionEvent necessary to close the window
